title: Bluetooth 5.3 in Ear Earbuds with 4 HD Microphone (Black), £24.99 at Amazon
text: Bluetooth 5.3 in Ear Earbuds with 4 HD Microphone (Black) Available from Amazon £24.99 £49.99 You can get these Bluetooth 5.3 In-Ear Earbuds with 4 HD Microphones (Black) reduced from £49.99 to £24.99. - 2023 Upgraded Bluetooth 5.3: The Bluetooth headphones are equipped with the advanced Bluetooth 5.3 chip and dual-channel transmission, bringing you an unprecedented audio experience with faster transmission speeds and more stable signal connections. With wireless headphones with a stable connection distance of up to 15 m, you can easily control your music and phone at home, in the office, and during exercise. - 4 ENC Microphones and Immersive Sound: Bluetooth earbuds built-in 13.4mm dynamic coil with composite graphene diaphragm, which offers finer and more pronounced high and midrange and produces strong bass. With four microphones and ambient noise-canceling technology (ENC), the headphones effectively reduce external noise and enable first-class speech recognition and clearly understandable communication in any environment. - Real-Time LED Displays and 42-Hour Playtime: The playtime of the earphones wireless Bluetooth lasts for over 6–8 hours from a single charge and 36 extra hours with a charging case. The LED display on in-ear headphones accurately displays the remaining power of the charging case and the charging progress of wireless earbuds to let you know the current power status of your headphones and charging case at any time. Equipped with USB-C quick charge, it only takes 1.5 hours to fully charge the earphone case. - Ergonomic IP7 Waterproof Design: Through the use of ultra-light nanomaterials, the wireless earphones reach IP7 waterproof grade, dust and rainproof. The extreme lightness, the in-ear design in line with the shape of human ears, and the softer silicone ear cap make you feel comfortable in any scene and can only hear your own music, all from these true wireless ear buds.
